short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hold your favorite button and draw, two modes are available - brush and arrow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to draw on top of the browser by pressing and holding additional buttons, hold down - draw, release - the picture has disappeared, this is a handy tool that can be used when presenting the ui of website
